DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effect of wagon for transporting vehicle instead of standard stretcher car for reducing preoperative children's anxiety.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Transportation Method on Preoperative Anxiety in Children
DOC.criteria: American Society of Anesthesiologist physical status I scheduled for elective surgery under general anesthesia history of anesthesia or surgery developmental delay weighing over than 38kg severe pain administrated psychotomimetic drug
